data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix gmelinii (Dahurian larch) from sample IKONLAGM-22

Exposition SW, Slope 8 deg, Geology: Moräne, Sand, Kies, Tree line -70 m, av. Tree height 8 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 70%, Herb cover 30%, Moss cover 50%, Vegatation type: Lä-Wald mit ALFR, Film number: 872A
